alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 8:42PM EDT until August 04 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WICOMICO AND NORTHEASTERN DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 842 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sharptown, or 8 miles southeast of Hurlock, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Sharptown around 850 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Galestown, Mardela Springs, Brookview, Eldorado, East New Market and Linkwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
